mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office_rule t1 where t1.enabled=1
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office_rule t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.name=#{name}
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office_rule t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.type=#{type}
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office_rule t1 where t1.enabled=1 order BY t1.level DESC limit 0,1
SELECT t1.* FROM sys_office_rule t1 where t1.enabled=1 and t1.level > ( SELECT level FROM sys_office_rule where id=#{id} ) limit 0,1
